tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_policies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    traffic_type VARCHAR(50),
    priority_level INT,
    policy_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(50),
    priority_level INT,
    traffic_type VARCHAR(50),
    max_bandwidth INT,
    policy_enabled BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    device_ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    policy_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES network_traffic_policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_policies (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  priority INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE subscribers (
  subscriber_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  subscriber_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  subscription_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  policy_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES network_policies(policy_id)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  subscriber_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (subscriber_id) REFERENCES subscribers(subscriber_id),
  message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_classes (
    class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name VARCHAR(50),
    priority INT
)

CREATE TABLE policy_rules (
    rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_id INT,
    condition VARCHAR(100),
    action VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    device_id INT,
    rule_id INT,
    traffic_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_rules ( 
    rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    rule_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    source_device_id INT NOT NULL, 
    destination_device_id INT NOT NULL, 
    classification_id INT NOT NULL, 
    priority_level INT NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_logs ( 
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    source_device_id INT NOT NULL, 
    destination_device_id INT NOT NULL, 
    rule_id INT NOT NULL, 
    action_taken VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL 
);
